mil7.6.1:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘sihassa satta angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani satta angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.6.1:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena setavimalaparisuddhapandaracittena byapagatakukkuccena bhavitabbam.
mil7.6.1:1.4: Idam, maharaja, sihassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.1:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, siho catucarano vikkantacari;
mil7.6.1:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena caturiddhipadacaranena bhavitabbam.
mil7.6.1:2.3: Idam, maharaja, sihassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.1:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena abhiruparucirasilakesarina bhavitabbam.
mil7.6.1:3.3: Idam, maharaja, sihassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.1:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, siho jivitapariyadanepi na kassaci onamati;
mil7.6.1:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharapariyadanepi na kassaci onamitabbam.
mil7.6.1:4.3: Idam, maharaja, sihassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.1:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, siho sapadanabhakkho yasmim okase nipatati, tattheva yavadattham bhakkhayati, na varamamsam vicinati;
mil7.6.1:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sapadanabhakkhena bhavitabbam, na kulani vicinitabbani, na pubbageham hitva kulani upasankamitabbani, na bhojanam vicinitabbam, yasmim okase kabalam adiyati, tasmimyeva okase bhunjitabbam sarirayapanattham, na varabhojanam vicinitabbam.
mil7.6.1:5.3: Idam, maharaja, sihassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.1:6.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, siho asannidhibhakkho, sakim gocaram bhakkhayitva na puna tam upagacchati;
mil7.6.1:6.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena asannidhikaraparibhogina bhavitabbam.
mil7.6.1:6.3: Idam, maharaja, sihassa chattham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.1:7.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, siho bhojanam aladdha na paritassati, laddhapi bhojanam agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno paribhunjati;
mil7.6.1:7.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena bhojanam aladdha na paritassitabbam, laddhapi bhojanam agadhitena amucchitena anajjhosannena adinavadassavina nissaranapannena paribhunjitabbam.
mil7.6.1:7.3: Idam, maharaja, sihassa sattamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.1:7.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena samyuttanikayavare theram mahakassapam parikittayamanena—
mil7.6.1:8.1: ‘Santutthoyam, bhikkhave, kassapo itaritarena pindapatena, itaritarapindapatasantutthiya ca vannavadi, na ca pindapatahetu anesanam appatirupam apajjati, aladdha ca pindapatam na paritassati, laddha ca pindapatam agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno adinavadassavi nissaranapanno paribhunjati’”ti.
